Function reference

Handle PAM data

Reading, crop, and basic operation for PAM data

pam_classify()
Automatic classification of pam
pam_read()
Read pam data
pam_read_file()
Read pam file
pam_sta()
Compute stationary periods

Trainset

Read and write csv file for trainset.net

trainset_edit()
Edit classification of activity and pressure
trainset_read()
Read classification of activity and pressure
trainset_write()
Write classification of activity and pressure

GeoPressure

Wrapper to the GeoPressure API

geopressure_map()
Request and download mismatch maps of pressure
geopressure_prob_map()
Compute probability raster
geopressure_ts()
Request and download surface pressure timeseries at location

Dataset

Dataset used for vignettes

prob_map_list
Probability map for 18LX
raster_list
Mismatch map for 18LX
ts_list
Probability timeseries for 18LX
